section.text: Your touch weakens the living and disorients undead. Make a melee touch attack. The effects of a hit depends on whether the target is living or undead. Heightening increases the damage.

section.name: Living Creature
section.text: 1d8 negative damage. On a critical hit, double damage and enfeebled 1 for 1 round.

section.name: Undead Creature
section.text: Flat-footed for 1 round. On a critical hit, it's also fleeing for 1 round unless it succeeds at a Will save.

section.name: Heightened (3rd)
section.text: Damage of 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

section.name: Heightened (5th)
section.text: Damage of 2d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

section.name: Heightened (7th)
section.text: Damage of 3d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

section.name: Heightened (9th)
section.text: Damage of 4d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

You create up to four floating lights, no two of which are more than 10 feet apart. Each sheds light like a torch. When you Concentrate on the Spell, you can move each light up to 60 feet. Each light must remain within range and within 10 feet of all others, or it winks out.
You cloud the target's mind with effects determined by its will save.

section.name: checkresult
section.text: The target is flat-footed and slowed 1.
You create simple sounds up to a maximum volume of four normal humans shouting, emanating from a square you designate within range. You can't create intelligible words or other intricate sounds.

section.name: Heightened (5th)
section.text: The spell's duration is permanent, but you must add a [[A]] Material Casting action during which you expend 6gp worth of embalming floud as a cost.
